ygData.subject: Re: Tashani vs Tashan
ygData.msgSnippet: OH YEA! Thank god for Tashani! Beats using a level 1 spell everytime. I believe it lowers Magic Resist 23 pts. That s not much more than Tashan, but it s less
ygData.messageBody:
OH YEA!

Thank god for Tashani! Beats using a level 1 spell everytime. I believe it
lowers Magic Resist 23 pts. That's not much more than Tashan, but it's less
resistable, and just a few more pts is welcome by myself espically, and the
ppl who group w/ me.



Telan Ka`Rlaah



At 11:59 AM 6/1/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>The upgrade doesnt seem to be that great ( when I cast it on me that is ). I
>dont have the numbers in mind anymore but Tashani lowers the MR slightly
>more than Tashan. I havent had the chance to play much after I got it.
>Anybody has comments about Tashani?
>
>Skara de Toxxulia <Elite>
>
>
